title: Putin Seeks BRICS Group's Support Against Western Pressure
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin will host a summit of BRICS leaders next week, seeking support in his standoff with the West from the expanded group that now represents about a third of global economic output.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin will host a summit of BRICS leaders next week, seeking support in his standoff with the West from the expanded group that now represents about a third of global economic output.

title: France Bars Israeli Exhibition At Defense Show Amid Dispute Over Gaza
content: Israeli delegations taking part in the major Euronaval defence show in France next month will not be permitted to set up any stand or exhibit hardware following a decision by the French government, organisers said on Wednesday.
summary: Israeli delegations taking part in the major Euronaval defence show in France next month will not be permitted to set up any stand or exhibit hardware following a decision by the French government, organisers said on Wednesday.

title: Russia Slams Zelensky's 'Victory Plan', Accuses Him Of Provoking NATO
content: Russia on Wednesday denounced a "victory plan" presented by Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, saying he was trying to push NATO into a direct conflict with Moscow.
summary: Russia on Wednesday denounced a "victory plan" presented by Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, saying he was trying to push NATO into a direct conflict with Moscow.

title: US Man Killed In Front Of His 3 Children During Road Rage Dispute
content: Giddens was arrested and now faces charges of murder and three counts of first-degree attempted murder.
summary: Giddens was arrested and now faces charges of murder and three counts of first-degree attempted murder.

title: Gaza Mother Mourns Son Killed In Israeli Strike Before 2nd Polio Vaccine
content: Holding his teddy bear, Gazan mother Asmaa al-Wasifi mourned her 10-year-old son, who was killed in an Israeli strike before he could take his second polio shot.
summary: Holding his teddy bear, Gazan mother Asmaa al-Wasifi mourned her 10-year-old son, who was killed in an Israeli strike before he could take his second polio shot.

title: UK Photojournalist Stabbed To Death By Teenage Son In US: Police
content: The 61-year-old had suffered a fatal stab wound to the neck, according to records from the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner.
summary: The 61-year-old had suffered a fatal stab wound to the neck, according to records from the Los Angeles County Medical Examiner.

title: "If Good Neighbourliness Is Missing...": S Jaishankar's Swipe At China, Pak
content: Speaking about the challenges faced in the region, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar in his address at the SCO Summit in Islamabad today made a veiled reference about China and Pakistan.
summary: Speaking about the challenges faced in the region, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar in his address at the SCO Summit in Islamabad today made a veiled reference about China and Pakistan.

title: Taiwan Woman Allegedly Kills Boy, 2, After Beating Him For A Week
content: An influencer in Taiwan who touted herself as a "caring" mother of five has been accused of abusing and killing a 2-year-old boy under her care.
summary: An influencer in Taiwan who touted herself as a "caring" mother of five has been accused of abusing and killing a 2-year-old boy under her care.

title: Russian Man Rescued After 66 Days At Sea Dropped 50 kg, Lived On Rainwater
content: A Russian man who survived 66 days adrift at sea in a small inflatable boat on Wednesday spoke from his hospital bed about his ordeal.
summary: A Russian man who survived 66 days adrift at sea in a small inflatable boat on Wednesday spoke from his hospital bed about his ordeal.

title: Zelensky Rules Out Ceding Ukrainian Land In Victory Plan
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Wednesday unveiled his long-awaited Victory Plan to end Russia's invasion, rejecting any territorial concessions and urging ramped-up Western backing, including an invitation to join NATO.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Wednesday unveiled his long-awaited Victory Plan to end Russia's invasion, rejecting any territorial concessions and urging ramped-up Western backing, including an invitation to join NATO.

title: Ukraine President Highlights Five Key Points In Victory Plan
content: Here are the five main points of a Ukrainian plan for victory against Russian invading forces no later than next year as outlined by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Wednesday.
summary: Here are the five main points of a Ukrainian plan for victory against Russian invading forces no later than next year as outlined by President Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Wednesday.

title: South Korean Footballer Apologises For Filming Secret Sex Videos
content: Mr Hwang expressed remorse, stating he was "deeply sorry" for causing "disappointment."
summary: Mr Hwang expressed remorse, stating he was "deeply sorry" for causing "disappointment."

title: How Israel's Bulky Pagers Pulled A Devastating Attack On Hezbollah
content: The batteries inside the weaponised pagers that arrived in Lebanon at the start of the year, part of an Israeli plot to decimate Hezbollah, had powerfully deceptive features and an Achilles' heel.
summary: The batteries inside the weaponised pagers that arrived in Lebanon at the start of the year, part of an Israeli plot to decimate Hezbollah, had powerfully deceptive features and an Achilles' heel.

title: Iran Warns Of "Decisive Response" If Israel Retaliates After Missile Attack
content: Iran's top diplomat has warned UN chief Antonio Guterres that Tehran is ready for a "decisive and regretful" response if Israel attacks his country in retaliation for a missile attack.
summary: Iran's top diplomat has warned UN chief Antonio Guterres that Tehran is ready for a "decisive and regretful" response if Israel attacks his country in retaliation for a missile attack.

title: US Woman, 32, Arrested For Allegedly Chopping Mother, Cooking Body Parts
content: A woman in the United States has been arrested on allegations of killing her mother and dismembering her body.
summary: A woman in the United States has been arrested on allegations of killing her mother and dismembering her body.

title: As Planet Warms, Droughts Likely Key Factor Driving People To Cities: Study
content: As the climate turns warmer and compels people to relocate, droughts could become the main driver of migration and cities are expected to become more populated, according to a study.
summary: As the climate turns warmer and compels people to relocate, droughts could become the main driver of migration and cities are expected to become more populated, according to a study.

title: Israel Strikes Hezbollah Strongholds In Lebanon, Rejects Ceasefire Calls
content: Israel conducted strikes on Wednesday targeting Hezbollah's main bastion and a city in southern Lebanon where it holds sway, after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed calls for a ceasefire.
summary: Israel conducted strikes on Wednesday targeting Hezbollah's main bastion and a city in southern Lebanon where it holds sway, after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu dismissed calls for a ceasefire.

title: Over 140 Killed As Fuel Tanker Explodes In Nigeria
content: An explosion has killed more than 140 people in northern Nigeria as crowds rushed to collect fuel spilling from a crashed tanker, officials told AFP on Wednesday.
summary: An explosion has killed more than 140 people in northern Nigeria as crowds rushed to collect fuel spilling from a crashed tanker, officials told AFP on Wednesday.

title: Inside China's Underground Lab Tasked With Solving A Physics Mystery
content: A giant sphere 700 m (2,300 ft) underground with thousands of light-detecting tubes will be sealed in a 12-storey cylindrical pool of water in coming months for an experiment that will shine new light on elusive subatomic particles called neutrinos.
summary: A giant sphere 700 m (2,300 ft) underground with thousands of light-detecting tubes will be sealed in a 12-storey cylindrical pool of water in coming months for an experiment that will shine new light on elusive subatomic particles called neutrinos.

title: Why Is North Korea Blowing Up Roads, Railways To The South?
content: Dynamiting inter-Korea roads and railways. Threatening war over drone incursions and moving nuclear-capable weapons to the border. North Korea appears very unhappy with the South at the moment.
summary: Dynamiting inter-Korea roads and railways. Threatening war over drone incursions and moving nuclear-capable weapons to the border. North Korea appears very unhappy with the South at the moment.
